languages.text: "Еще бы! Вот так ирония — я столько лет ждал встречи с достойным врагом, а в итоге сам взрастил чудище, да еще и назначил его своей правой рукой". {n}Вольный Торговец смеется, чуть не захлебываясь кровью.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Еще бы! Вот так ирония — я столько лет ждал встречи с достойным врагом, а в итоге сам взрастил чудище, да еще и назначил его своей правой рукой". {n}Вольный Торговец смеется, чуть не захлебываясь кровью.{/n} "

languages.text: "That it was! What irony... I have waited for so long to find a worthy enemy, but ended up raising one myself and even appointing him as my right hand." {n}The Rogue Trader laughs, almost choking on blood.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Еще бы! Вот так ирония — я столько лет ждал встречи с достойным врагом, а в итоге сам взрастил чудище, да еще и назначил его своей правой рукой". {n}Вольный Торговец смеется, чуть не захлебываясь кровью.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "True! What irony — I had been waiting for so long to find a worthy enemy, but ended up raising one myself and even appointing him as my right hand." {n}The Rogue Trader laughs, almost choking on blood.{/n}

"True! What irony — I had been waiting for so long to find a worthy enemy, but ended up raising one myself and even appointing him as my right hand." {n}The Rogue Trader laughs, almost choking on blood.{/n}

"That it was! What irony... I have waited for so long to find a worthy enemy, but ended up raising one myself and even appointing him as my right hand." {n}The Rogue Trader laughs, almost choking on blood.{/n}

languages.text: «¡Desde luego! Qué ironía; tanto tiempo esperando un enemigo digno, y al final yo mismo lo he criado y hasta lo nombré mi mano derecha». {n}El Comerciante Independiente ríe y casi se atraganta con la sangre.{/n}
languages.original_text: "That it was! What irony... I have waited for so long to find a worthy enemy, but ended up raising one myself and even appointing him as my right hand." {n}The Rogue Trader laughs, almost choking on blood.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «¡Ciertamente! Qué ironía; tanto tiempo esperando un enemigo digno, y al final yo mismo lo he criado y hasta lo nombré mi mano derecha». {n}El Comerciante Independiente ríe y casi se atraganta con la sangre.{/n}

languages.text: “可不是嘛！真是讽刺……我等了这么久，一直希望碰到个旗鼓相当的敌人。可没想到，这个人一直就躲在我手底下，甚至还是我的得力助手。”{n}卡里戈斯大笑起来，险些被血呛住。{/n}
languages.original_text: "That it was! What irony... I have waited for so long to find a worthy enemy, but ended up raising one myself and even appointing him as my right hand." {n}The Rogue Trader laughs, almost choking on blood.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “可不是嘛！真是讽刺……我等了这么久，一直渴望遇到旗鼓相当的敌人。可没想到这个人一直就躲在我手底下，甚至还是我的得力助手。”{n}卡里戈斯大笑起来，险些被血呛住。{/n}

languages.text: « Absolument ! Quelle ironie... J'attendais depuis si longtemps de trouver un ennemi digne de ce nom, sans réaliser que j'en avais élevé un moi-même et que j'avais fait de lui mon bras droit. » {n}Le libre-marchand éclate de rire et manque de s'étouffer avec son propre sang.{/n}
languages.original_text: "That it was! What irony... I have waited for so long to find a worthy enemy, but ended up raising one myself and even appointing him as my right hand." {n}The Rogue Trader laughs, almost choking on blood.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Absolument ! Quelle ironie... J'attendais depuis si longtemps de trouver un ennemi digne de ce nom, sans réaliser que j'en avais élevé un moi-même et que j'avais fait de lui mon bras droit. » {n}Le libre-marchand se met à rire et manque de s'étouffer avec son propre sang.{/n}

languages.text: 「まったくその通りだ！皮肉なものだ…俺は長い間、立派な敵を見つけるのを待っていたのに、結局自分でそれを育てて、己の右腕にまで任命してしまった」{n}自由開拓者は血の気が引きかけた顔で笑う。{/n}
languages.original_text: "That it was! What irony... I have waited for so long to find a worthy enemy, but ended up raising one myself and even appointing him as my right hand." {n}The Rogue Trader laughs, almost choking on blood.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「まったくその通りだ！皮肉なものだ…俺は長い間、立派な敵を見つけるのを待っていたのに、結局自分でそれを育てて、己の右腕にまで任命してしまった」{n}自由開拓者は血の気が引きかけた顔で笑う。{/n}

languages.text: "Oh ja! Welch Ironie ... Ich habe so lange darauf gewartet, einen würdigen Gegner zu finden, dabei habe ich selbst einen großgezogen und sogar zu meiner rechten Hand ernannt." {n}Der Freihändler lacht und erstickt dabei fast an seinem eigenen Blut.{/n}
languages.original_text: "That it was! What irony... I have waited for so long to find a worthy enemy, but ended up raising one myself and even appointing him as my right hand." {n}The Rogue Trader laughs, almost choking on blood.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Es ist wahr! Welch Ironie — ich habe so lange darauf gewartet, einen würdigen Gegner zu finden, dabei habe ich selbst einen großgezogen und sogar zu meiner rechten Hand ernannt." {n}Der Freihändler lacht und erstickt dabei fast an seinem eigenen Blut.{/n}

languages.text: "Hem de ne iyi! İroniye bak... Bana layık bir düşman bulmak için o kadar uzun zaman bekledim ama gidip kendi düşmanımı kendim yarattım. Hatta gidip onu sağkolum olarak atadım." {n}Hür Tacir, âdeta kanında boğulurcasına kahkaha atıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "That it was! What irony... I have waited for so long to find a worthy enemy, but ended up raising one myself and even appointing him as my right hand." {n}The Rogue Trader laughs, almost choking on blood.{/n}
